column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Sinarhen Amrafel
column5: nye Goiimhen Tidal aber do no
column11: nye Belahen (ɔnoara nye Zoar) yɛɛ ɔsa."

column2: "Woyinom nyinara bɔɔ mu wɔ Siddim bɔnsa mu (ɔnoara nye Nkyen Po no)."
"Mfe duebien na wɔsoom Kedorlaomer
column3: na afe a otsia duebiasa no mu no wɔtseew etua."

column2: "Na afe a otsia duanan no mu na Kedorlaomer na ahemfo a wɔka no ho no bae
column7: "na Horfo wɔ hɔn bepɔw Seir do
column8: dze kodu El-paran a ɔwɔ sar no ho no."

column2: "Na wɔsanee
column5: nye Amorifo so a wɔtse Hazazon-tamar no."

column2: "Na Sodom
column6: nye Bela (ɔnoara nye Zoar) ahemfo fiir edzi; na wɔnye hɔn kɔbɔɔ enyim wɔ Siddim bɔnsa mu."

column2: "Elamhen Kedorlaomer
column5: nye Elasarhen Ariok; dɛm ahemfo baanan no soɛree tsiaa beenum no."

column2: "Nna hua amona wɔ Siddim bɔnsa mu ma ara tɔ; na ber Sodom nye Gomora ahemfo no ruguan no
column3: binom koguu mu na hɔn a wɔkae no guanee kɔr bepɔw no do."

column2: "Na wɔfaa Sodom nye Gomora ndzɛmba nyinara
"Na wɔfaa Lot
column3: Abram no nua ba a ɔtse Sodom no

column2: "Na obi a ofii nsa bae bɛkaa kyerɛɛ Hebriwnyi Abram a aber yi nna ɔtse Amorinyi Mamre
column3: Eskol nye Aner hɔn nua no no nsudur ho no; nna woyinom ɔnye Abram akyekyer."

column2: "Na aber a Abram tsee dɛ wɔafa no nua ne ba ndɔmmum no
column3: ɔdze no nkorɔfo a wɔatsetse hɔn a wɔwoo hɔn wɔ ne fie
column5: na wotsiiw hɔn araa kodur Dan."

column2: "Na ɔno nye no nkowaa kyɛɛ hɔnho mu kɔr hɔn do anafua
column4: na wotsiiw hɔn kodur Hoba a ɔwɔ Damaskɔs n’abankum no."

column2: "Na ɔdze ndzɛmba no nyinara sanee bae
column3: ɔdze no nua ne ba Lot

column2: "Na ɔsanee fi Kedorlaomer nye ahemfo a wɔka no ho no hɔn do nkonyimdzi no reba no
column3: Sodomhen puei kehyiaa no kwan wɔ Savɛ bɔnsa mu (ɔnoara nye ɔhen no Bɔnsa mu)."

column2: "Na Salemhen Melkizedek dze paanoo nye wenyin bae: nna ɔyɛ Abɔso Nyankopɔn no sɔfoe."
"Na ohyiaa no
column4: Nhyira mfi Abɔso Nyankopɔn a ɔsor nye asaase yɛ nedze no hɔ nka Abram;"

column2: "na nhyira nka Abɔso Nyankopɔn a ɔdze w’atamfo ahyɛ wo nsa. Na Abram maa no ndzɛmba no nyinara mu ebupɛn du du."
"Na Sodomhen see Abram dɛ
"Na Abram see Sodomhen no dɛ
column3: Mama me nsa do makyerɛ EWURADZE
column4: Abɔso Nyankopɔn a ɔsor nye asaase yɛ nedze no
column6: "dɛ mennkɛfa ahoma anaa mpaboaahoma anaa biribiara a ɔyɛ wodze

column2: "gyedɛ dza mberantsɛ no edzi no nko
column4: Eskol nye Mamre a wɔnye me kɔree no hɔn kyɛpɛn."
